segments.text: It's said you will go abroad to pursue your graduate studies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I've been thinking about visiting you . I hope to get some advice from you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which country do you want to go to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My field is electronic engineering . Which country do you think I should go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Were I in your position , I'd go to America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which university should I apply to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are many universities for you to choose from . Some famous universities such as Harvard , Yale , the University of Michigan , and Massachusetts Institute of Technology are really wonderful places to study , but they are very competitive and expensive . Some smaller universities or institutes are also very nice but much cheaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
